name: Real Construction Excavator: Heavy Duty Crane
name_original: Real Construction Excavator: Heavy Duty Crane
description:
Get ready to handle the largest heavy traffic vehicles (HTV), excavators, tractors, trucks and machines the man has even made. These monster excavator machines vehicles are not easy to handle and drive. So prepare yourself to be dazzled with this Real Construction Excavator: Heavy Duty Crane simulation game which will test your heavy duty excavator driving and parking skills
You have to complete the digging, mining, excavation, transportation and construction task in a planned and in sequential manner. Plan your tasks and duties in step by step way within the given timelines. In this Real Construction Excavator: Heavy Duty Crane: to complete the tasks with multiple extreme heavy duty machines and vehicles will be an exciting challenge for you. The weather also plays a crucial part in your ability to complete the tasks on time. The heavy snow also makes it difficult for the traffic to move all along. So first you need to clear the roads and construction sites from the snow so that the traffic and heavy machines, excavators and cranes can able to perform their tasks.
Real Construction Excavator: Heavy Duty Crane is a real heavy duty machine handling simulation game that will test and surprise at the same time. This is an addictive task oriented game with many brain challenging levels and missions for kids, family and friends. With amazing 3D graphics and smooth game-play controls, you will not sit back until you completed your heavy duty excavation task!
Features
1) Smooth and Easy Game Controls
2) Exciting and Challenging Missions
3) Amazing 3D Graphics and Environment
4) Multiple Heavy Duty Machines, Excavators and Vehicles
5) Great Fun For Kids and Family
